item.title: Make resume from html-css-js.md
item.description: this is the command that does the job. Well for now it only ouput properly in image format. I am still looking for solution to output in pdf format. This is using Wkhtmltopdf : wkhtmltoimage --images --javascript-delay 5000 http://localhost:5500/ testcv2.png I’m using local server for this and code in vscode :D
